column4: Anyone know how to make a gvfs mounted usb camera accessible to programs like dd and scalpel? I need to be able to mount the camera as a drive
if you have access to a win box, this ROX for SD card recovery. I use it to get stuff all the time. http://www.pcinspector.de/default.htm
I'll try that. I have windows running in virtualbox. I imagine it'll work through there
